## Proof of concept

This is a basic example which shows you how to solve a common problem:

```{r example}
library(quanteda)
library(tokenvars)

x <- tokens(c("this is great", "not so great man")) %>% tokens_add_tokenvars()
x
```

```{r example2}
tokenvars(x)
```
